Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • pap1213.assignment.nbody.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Context.

    It represents the class that generate the bodies with different method, and receive the request from the GUI ControlPanel class

    Author:
    Nompleggio Pietro Antonio, Buscarini Andrea

        Load File Generate Body method.

        This method receive a file to read and generate bodies.

        Parameters:
        file - the txt file to reade to get all bodies to create
        Returns:
        boolean return true if success the file loading, otherwise return false

      • analizeLine

        public boolean analizeLine(java.lang.String line,
                  int n_body)
        Analize Line method.

        This method read the line and extract the body information, and create the Body.

        Parameters:
        line - the text line to parse
        n_body - the number of bodies
        Returns:
        boolean return true if success the file reading, otherwise return false
